/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the sides of the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and vehicles. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
